block.comment: Create product table from EBS Account search result

input.sql:
select distinct
oli.ActualEndDate__c,
oli.ActualStartDate__c,
oli.CurrencyIsoCode,
oli.quantity,
oli.Description,
oli.UnitPrice,

opportunity.opportunitynumber,
opportunity.superregion,


 contact.firstname as contactfirstname,
 contact.lastname as contactlastname,
 contact.email,
 
 product.ProductCode, 
 
 acct.Name,
 
 CASE
    WHEN oli.Previous_Contract_ID__c IS NOT NULL
         AND oli.Previous_Install_Base_Number__c IS NOT NULL
    THEN 'EBS-' || oli.Previous_Contract_ID__c || '-' || oli.Previous_Install_Base_Number__c
    ELSE 'SFDC-' || oli.Id
END AS sourcerecordid


from #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"70ea555a","path":["list_name"]}')} as oli

left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"7af2bccf","path":["list_name"]}')} as acct
on oli.Entitle_To_Account__c = acct.id

left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"0e98421d","path":["list_name"]}')} as contact
on oli.Entitle_To_Contact__c = contact.id

LEFT JOIN  #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"3f6158bc","path":["list_name"]}')} as product
    ON   oli.ProductCode = product.productcode
    OR product.productcode = 
       CASE
        WHEN substr(oli.ProductCode, -2) = 'RN'
             THEN substr(oli.ProductCode, 1, length(oli.ProductCode) - 2)
        WHEN substr(oli.ProductCode, -1) = 'S'
             THEN substr(oli.ProductCode, 1, length(oli.ProductCode) - 1)
        ELSE oli.ProductCode
     END
       
       
left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"09a56b08","path":["list_name"]}')} as opportunity 
on oli.OpportunityId = opportunity.opportunityid
